mapper.select: SELECT co.COSTKEY costkey, p.NAME name, TO_CHAR(p.STARTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')STARTDATE ,TO_CHAR(p.LASTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') LASTDATE , cl.NAME company , p.MANAGER pm, co.COSTASSIGN costassign FROM PROJECT p , CLIENT cl , COST co WHERE co.PROJECTKEY = p.PROJECTKEY AND co.CLIENTKEY = cl.CLIENTKEY
